Package fr.sii.ogham.core.builder.mimetype

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MimetypeDetectionBuilder<P>
    Builder that configures mimetype detection.
    ReplaceMimetypeBuilder<P>
    Configures mimetype replacement.
    TikaBuilder<P>
    Enable mimetype detection using Apache Tika.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MimetypeDetectionBuilderDelegate<P>
    Implementation that just delegates all operations to another builder.
    ReplaceMimetypeBuilderDelegate<P>
    Implementation that just delegates all operations to another builder.
    SimpleMimetypeDetectionBuilder<P>
    Builds a FallbackMimeTypeProvider: If SimpleMimetypeDetectionBuilder.tika() has been called, then registers Tika as main mimetype detector If SimpleMimetypeDetectionBuilder.defaultMimetype(String) has been called, then registers a fallback to provide a default mimetype if none of the previously registered detectors could detect mimetype If no detector has been registered a BuildException is thrown (mimetype detection is required by many Ogham components If only one detector is registered, the FallbackMimeTypeProvider is not used and instead the alone detector is directly used
    SimpleReplaceMimetypeBuilder<P>  
    SimpleTikaBuilder<P>
    Instantites and configures the TikaProvider: If a custom Tika instance has been provided, then use it directly If no custom Tika instance has been provided, then use the default one: new Tika() (see TikaConfig.getDefaultConfig()) Tika may be in some conditions not enough accurate.
    TikaBuilderDelegate<P>
    Implementation that just delegates all operations to another builder.
